# gxg-template

## Properties

| Property         | Attribute          | Description                                                    | Type                               | Default       |
| ---------------- | ------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------- | ------------- |
| `disabled`       | `disabled`         | The state of the toggle. Whether is disabled or not.           | `boolean`                          | `false`       |
| `fullWidth`      | `full-width`       | Whether the accordion is fullwidth or not                      | `boolean`                          | `false`       |
| `mode`           | `mode`             | The aesthetical mode                                           | `"boxed" \| "classical" \| "slim"` | `"classical"` |
| `padding`        | `padding`          | The padding for the alternative version                        | `"l" \| "m" \| "s" \| "xs"`        | `"xs"`        |
| `singleItemOpen` | `single-item-open` | Wether only one accordion can be open at the same time or not. | `boolean`                          | `false`       |
| `width`          | `width`            | The accordion width                                            | `string`                           | `"360px"`     |
